changeSet.author: glasir
changeSet.sql:
-- @version $Id: //product/DAS/version/10.2/templates/DAS/sql/create_gsa_subscribers_ddl.xml#1 $$Change: 735822 $
create table das_gsa_subscriber ( id integer not null, address varchar2(50) not null, port integer not null, repository varchar2(256) not null, itemdescriptor varchar2(256) not null ,constraint das_gsa_subscrib_p primary key (id));
